00011 #ifndef PARAMETER_h
00012 #define PARAMETER_h
00013 #include "VParameterNode.hh"
00014 #include "Message.hh"
00015 #include <stdexcept>
00016 #include <string>
00017 #include <cstdlib>
00018 #include <typeinfo>
00019 #include <ctime>
00020 #include <cstdio>
00021 
00028 template<class T> class Parameter : public VParameterNode{
00029 public:
00031   Parameter(T& t, const std::string& key="", const std::string& helptext = "") :
00032     VParameterNode(key, helptext), _val(t) {_node_type = PARAMETER;}
00034   Parameter(const Parameter& right) : 
00035     VParameterNode(right._default_key, right._helptext), _val(right._val) {}
00037   virtual ~Parameter() {};
00039   Parameter& operator=(const Parameter& right){ _val=right._val; return *this;}
00041   const T& GetValue(){ return _val; }
00043   virtual int PrintHelp(const std::string& myname="") const;
00044 protected:
00046   virtual std::istream& ReadFrom( std::istream& in , bool single=false);
00048   virtual std::ostream& WriteTo( std::ostream& out , int);
00050   virtual unsigned long ReadUnsignedInt(std::istream& in){
00051     std::string temp;
00052     in>>temp;
00053     if(temp[0] == '0' && (temp[1] == 'x' || temp[1] == 'X'))
00054       return std::strtoul(temp.c_str(),0,16);
00055     else
00056       return std::strtoul(temp.c_str(),0,10);
00057   }
00058 private:
00059   T& _val; 
00060 };
00061   
00062 //template members must go here so they'll actually get compiled
00063 template<class T>
00064 inline std::istream& Parameter<T>::ReadFrom(std::istream& in, bool)
00065 {
00066   if( !( in >> _val ) && !in.eof()){
00067     Message e(EXCEPTION);
00068     e<<"Error trying to read parameter with default key "<<_default_key<<"!\n";
00069     throw std::invalid_argument(e.str());
00070   }
00071   return in;
00072 }
00073 
00074 template<class T>
00075 inline std::ostream& Parameter<T>::WriteTo(std::ostream& out, int)
00076 {
00077   return out<<_val;
00078 }
00079 
00080 template<class T>
00081 inline int Parameter<T>::PrintHelp(const std::string& myname) const
00082 {
00083   VParameterNode::PrintHelp(myname);
00084   std::cout<<"Parameter type: "<<typeid(_val).name()<<"\n"
00085            <<"Current Value:  "<<_val<<std::endl;
00086   std::string dummy;
00087   std::cout<<"\nHit <enter> to continue.";
00088   std::getline(std::cin, dummy);
00089   std::getline(std::cin, dummy);
00090   
00091   return 0;
00092 }
00093 
00095 template<> inline std::ostream& Parameter<bool>::WriteTo(std::ostream& out, int)
00096 {
00097   return out<<std::boolalpha<<_val<<std::noboolalpha;
00098 }
00099 
00101 template<> inline std::istream& Parameter<bool>::ReadFrom(std::istream& in, bool)
00102 {
00103   std::string temp;
00104   in>>temp;
00105   if(temp == "1" || temp == "true" || temp == "TRUE")
00106     _val = true;
00107   else if( temp == "0" || temp == "false" || temp == "FALSE" )
00108     _val = false;
00109   else{
00110     Message e(EXCEPTION);
00111     e<<"Expected boolean value, got "<<temp<<std::endl;
00112     throw std::invalid_argument(e.str());
00113   }
00114   return in;
00115 }
00116 
00118 template<> inline std::ostream& Parameter<unsigned>::WriteTo(std::ostream& out, int)
00119 {
00120   return out<<std::hex<<std::showbase<<_val<<std::noshowbase<<std::dec;
00121 }
00122

00149 {
00150   _val = ReadUnsignedInt(in); return in;
